title: Guy Geller
description:
What a life Guy Geller has lived and we haven't even scratched the surface. Guy joins to discuss all things Magnolia (00:49:31). We are very concerned about Chris' new podcast (00:09:12). A football writer won't vote for Aaron Rodgers for MVP because he's "the biggest jerk in the league" (00:12:15). The Barstool Chicago guys are number one in The Dozen... for the time being (00:32:00).


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
